conbody.p: If the place of performance is unknown, the contracting officer may use the procedures in this section. The contracting officer should first attempt to identify the specific places or geographical areas where the services might be performed (see 22.1009-2 ) and then may follow the procedures either in 22.1009-3 or in 22.1009-4 .
